key.name: gap-size
key.description: Percentage to leave out as gap when the window in focus is tiled.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-center
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to center.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-left
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to left.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-right
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to right.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-top
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to top.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-top-left
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to top left.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-top-right
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to top right.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-bottom
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to bottom.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-bottom-left
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to bottom left.

key.name: shortcut-tile-window-to-bottom-right
key.description: Shortcut to tile the window in focus to bottom right.

key.name: shortcut-align-window-to-center
key.description: Shortcut to align the window in focus to center without resizing it.

key.name: shortcut-increase-gap-size
key.description: Shortcut to increase the gap size.

key.name: shortcut-decrease-gap-size
key.description: Shortcut to decrease the gap size.

key.name: enable-inner-gaps
key.description: Put gaps between windows.

key.name: enable-window-animation
key.description: Add animation on windows.

key.name: next-step-timeout
key.description: Maximum time of you can adjust tiling step by iterating same keybinding in milliseconds.

key.name: gap-size-increments
key.description: Determine how much gap size adjust by keybinding.

key.name: enable-bottom-gap
key.description: Add an additional gap at the bottom of the screen to prevent dock overlap.

key.name: bottom-gap-size
key.description: Additional gap size at the bottom of the screen in percentage.

key.name: bottom-gap-main-screen-only
key.description: Apply the additional bottom gap only on the main screen.

key.name: tiling-steps-center
key.description: Steps on first and successive key presses when tiling.

key.name: tiling-steps-side
key.description: Steps on first and successive key presses when tiling.
